cuisine.name: Bengali
cuisine.description: Savor authentic Bengali flavors at Bengal Spice Bistro, with traditional dishes like macher jhol and shorshe ilish.

cuisine.name: Maharashtrian
cuisine.description: Enjoy a taste of Maharashtra with specialties like vada pav and pav bhaji at Maharashtra Magic.

cuisine.name: South Indian
cuisine.description: Dosa Delight brings you traditional South Indian fare including dosas, idlis, and sambar.

cuisine.name: Chettinad
cuisine.description: Discover the bold flavors of Chettinad cuisine with a variety of curries and rice dishes at Chettinad Charm.

cuisine.name: Punjabi
cuisine.description: Experience hearty Punjabi meals including parathas, butter chicken, and dal makhani at Punjabi Paradise.

cuisine.name: Rajasthani
cuisine.description: Enjoy rich and spicy Rajasthani cuisine, featuring dishes like dal baati churma and laal maas at Rajasthan Royalty.

cuisine.name: Goan
cuisine.description: Savor seafood delights and Goan specialties such as vindaloo and xacuti at Goa Delicacies.

cuisine.name: Hyderabadi
cuisine.description: Famous for its biryani, Hyderabad Feast also offers traditional dishes like haleem and kebabs.

cuisine.name: Kashmiri
cuisine.description: Relish Kashmiri specialties such as Rogan Josh and Gustaba at Kashmiri Cuisine Corner.

cuisine.name: Kerala
cuisine.description: Kerala Delights offers an array of Kerala dishes including appam, stew, and Kerala sadya.
